Duplicate Privilege Set

Use the Duplicate Privilege Set dialog box (Admin | Security | Privilege Sets | Duplicate the Selected Privilege Set button) to duplicate the selected privilege set.

Field Descriptions

Name Enter the name of the new privilege set. The name cannot begin or end with a tab or blank space. Any character can be used in the name except * : \ ' " ( ).
Duplicate from Displays the name of the privileges set you selected to duplicate.
Copy privileges Select this check box to copy the existing privileges set's privileges to the new privilege set.
Copy restrict by promotion group Select this check box to copy the existing privilege set's promotion group restriction to the new privilege set.

See Also
